Verses: 1 nee Oru Adhipadhiyode Pojanampanna Utkaarndhaal, Unakku Munbaaga Irukkiradhai Nandraaik Gavaniththuppaar.
2 nee Pojanappiriyanaayirundhaal, Un Thondaiyile Kaththiyai Vai.
3 avanudaiya Rusiyulla Padhaarththangalai Ichchiyaadhe; Avaigal Kallappojanamaame.
4 aisuvariyavaanaagavendumendru Prayaasappadaadhe; Suyabuththiyai Saaraadhe.
5 illaamarpogum Porulmel Unkangalaip Parakkaviduvaanen? Adhu Kazhugaippola Siragugalaith Thanakku Undupannikkondu, Aagaayamaarkkamaaip Parandhupom.
6 vankannanudaiya Aagaaraththaip Pusiyaadhe; Avanudaiya Rusiyulla Padhaarththangalai Ichchiyaadhe.
7 avan Irudhayaththin Ninaivu Eppadiyo, Appadiye Avan Irukkiraan; Pusiyum, Baanampannum Endru Avan Unnode Sonnaalum, Avan Irudhayam Unnode Iraadhu.
8 nee Pusiththa Thunikkaiyai Vaandhipanni, Un Iniya Sorkalai Izhandhupovaai.
9 moodanudaiya Sevigal Ketkappesaadhe; Avan Un Vaarththaigalin Gnaanaththai Asattaipannuvaan.
10 poorva Ellaikkuriyai Maatraadhe; Thikkatra Pillaigaludaiya Nilangalai Abagariththukkollaadhe.
11 avargaludaiya Meetpar Vallavar; Avar Unnudane Avargalukkaaga Vazhakkaaduvaar.
12 un Irudhayaththai Buththimadhikkum, Un Sevigalai Arivin Vaarththaigalukkum Saaippaayaaga.
13 pillaiyai Thandiyaamal Vidaadhe; Avanaip Pirambinaal Adiththaal Avan Saagaan.
14 nee Pirambinaal Avanai Adikkiradhinaal Paadhaalaththukku Avan Aaththumaavaith Thappuvippaaye.
15 en Magane, Un Irudhayam Gnaanamulladhaayirundhaal, Ennile En Irudhayam Magizhum.
16 un Udhadugal Semmaiyaanavaigalaip Pesinaal, En Ullindhiriyangal Magizhum.
17 un Manadhaip Paavigalmel Poraamaikolla Vidaadhe; Nee Naadorum Karththaraip Patrum Bayaththodiru.
18 nichchayamaagave Mudivu Undu; Un Nambikkai Veenpogaadhu.
19 en Magane, Nee Sevikoduththu Gnaanamadaindhu, Un Irudhayaththai Nalvazhiyile Nadaththu.
20 madhubaanappiriyaraiyum Maamsap Peruntheenikkaararaiyum Seraadhe.
21 kudiyanum Pojanappiriyanum Thariththiraraavaargal; Thookkam Kandhaigalai Uduththuvikkum.
22 unnaip Petra Thagappanukku Sevikodu; Un Thaai Vayadhusendravalaagumbodhu Avalai Asattaipannaadhe.
23 saththiyaththai Vaangu, Adhai Virkaadhe; Appadiye Gnaanaththaiyum Ubadhesaththaiyum Buththiyaiyum Vaangu.
24 needhimaanudaiya Thagappan Migavum Kalikooruvaan; Gnaanamulla Pillaiyaip Petravan Avanaal Magizhuvaan.
25 un Thagappanum Un Thaayum Sandhoshappaduvaargal; Unnaip Petraval Magizhuvaal.
26 en Magane, Un Irudhayaththai Enakkuth Thaa; Un Kangal En Vazhigalai Nokkuvadhaaga.
27 vesi Aazhamaana Padukuzhi; Parasthree Idukkamaana Kinaru.
28 aval Kollaikkaaranaippola Padhivirundhu, Manusharukkulle Paadhagaraip Perugappannugiraal.
29 aiyo! Yaarukku Vedhanai? Yaarukkuth Dhukkam? Yaarukku Sandaigal? Yaarukkup Pulambal? Yaarukkuk Kaaranamillaadha Kaayangal? Yaarukku Raththankalangina Kangal?
30 madhupaanam Irukkum Idaththile Thangith Tharippavargalukkum, Kalappulla Saaraayaththai Naadugiravargalukkundhaane.
31 madhupaanam Raththavarunamaayirundhu, Paaththiraththil Palapalappaaith Thondrumbodhu, Nee Adhaip Paaraadhe; Adhu Medhuvaai Irangum.
32 mudivile Adhu Paambaippol Kadikkum, Viriyanaippol Theendum.
33 un Kangal Parasthreegalai Nokkum; Un Ullam Thaarumaaraanavaigalaip Pesum.
34 nee Nadukkadalile Sayaniththirukkiravanaippolum, Paaimaraththattile Paduththirukkiravanaippolum Iruppaai.
35 ennai Adiththaargal, Enakku Nogavillai; Ennai Araindhaargal, Enakku Suranaiyillai; Naan Adhaip Pinnum Thodarndhu Theda Eppozhudhu Vizhippen Enbaai.
